backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing a footer attribution removal feature and its related files, components, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file's purpose, styling, analytics setup, and deployment info.
frontend/ANALYTICS.md: Guide explaining how to enable and configure GA4 using a measurement ID and environment variables.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Instructions for connecting a custom domain to an Internet Computer frontend canister with DNS and setup steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining warm OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with favicon assets, root container, script loader, and optional canonical URL injection.
frontend/src/analytics/ga4.ts: Utility to initialize GA4 only when configured and provide safe event and page‑view tracking.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React single‑page site with smooth scrolling, product listings, location and contact sections, and GA4 initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity provider and hook handling II login, identity loading, logout, and auth client lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining warm stationery‑themed color tokens, dark mode variants, and global spacing rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Main React entry that mounts App with InternetIdentityProvider and React Query client.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, plugin usage, custom colors, fonts, layout settings, and extended utilities.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing site requirements, features, issues, and architectural notes for the stationery shop website.
